name: Smithing Daddy
description:
Smithing Daddy

Keep trying to make only one sword using only one button. We plan on fleshing this game out further if people are interested!

Inspired by Fantasy Life and Cooking Mama

For the GMTK 2019 Game Jam

By: The Cornered Crew; Appel Boom (Natasha Fritz), Jakorak (Kevin Nickel), Wono65 (Andrew Poole)
